page.title: 07SOUTHGATES STABLES 2
page.content: The tack can be worth up to Â£10000. The harnesses are worth Â£1500,a team set is Â£4000 and the saddles are worth Â£500_Â£600.Some of the events are cross country and polo.The length of the track on cross country events are up to 2240m,5400m and 300_600m for show jumping.We asked how many events there were in a year but he could'nt answer because there were so many but he said there were 18 events in the park.Some of the events last up to 1_3 days.The most expensive kind of horse they have is the Australian cow ponies which are used for polo and they have 3 of them at Southgates.Some of the horses have been on T.V show walking.They train at Southgates because they have a track and a school there.In a carriage they usually have 2_4 people.
